meanings.definition: In a manner that requires some manual operation in addition to automatic functioning.
meanings.sent1: He typed semiautomatically, pressing some keys by hand and letting the computer fill in the rest.
meanings.sent2: The machine sewed semiautomatically, with the sewer guiding the fabric while the machine stitched.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced semiautomatically, moving its arms manually but letting its legs move on their own.
meanings.sent4: The car drove semiautomatically, with the driver steering but the cruise control maintaining speed.
meanings.sent5: She cooked semiautomatically, chopping vegetables by hand and letting the food processor blend the ingredients.

meanings.definition: With a mechanism that performs some of the tasks automatically.
meanings.sent1: The semiautomatically controlled door opened when someone approached.
meanings.sent2: The semiautomatically operated camera adjusted its focus based on lighting conditions.
meanings.sent3: The semiautomatically watering plant pot released water when the soil dried out.
meanings.sent4: The semiautomatically adjusting chair reclined when the person leaned back.
meanings.sent5: The semiautomatically sorting mailbox directed mail to different compartments based on addresses.
